function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High reduction in airplane seats and passenger traffic due to COVID-19 impact","Impact":"Significant loss of gross operating revenues for the aviation industry, economic downturn","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety measures, build passenger confidence in air travel, support economic recovery","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, digital health passports, air filtration systems","People":"Passengers, airline industry, aviation workers","Owner":"Airline industry, government authorities"},{"Description":"Decline in international passengers and airport revenues","Impact":"Substantial financial losses for airports and aviation industry, economic strain","Mitigation":"Implement health and safety protocols, restore confidence in air travel, support economic recovery","Technologies":"Contactless check-in systems, biometric identification, air quality monitoring","People":"International passengers, airport authorities, aviation workers","Owner":"Airport authorities, aviation industry"},{"Description":"Revenue loss and drop in passenger kilometres for domestic and international routes","Impact":"Revenue decline and decrease in passenger activity, economic strain","Mitigation":"Implement health protocols, restore passenger confidence, support economic recovery","Technologies":"Contactless services, digital health passes, air filtration systems","People":"Passengers, airline industry, aviation workers","Owner":"Airline industry, government authorities"}]}
